# Outline Width

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class             | Support     |
| ----------------- | ----------- |
| `outline-0`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `outline-1`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `outline-2`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `outline-4`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `outline-8`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
